vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.36;
son of: Jonathan (H3129K);
brother of: Zechariah (H2148Z), Shemaiah (H8098V), Azarel (H5832J), Gilalai (H1562), Maai (H4597), Nethanel (H5417P), Judah (H3063K) and Hanani (H2607K)
§ Milalai = "eloquent"
son of the priest Jonathan and a descendant of Asaph
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米拉萊 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "能言善道的"
祭司約拿單的兒子，亞撒的後裔之一 (尼 12:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米拉莱 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "能言善道的"
祭司约拿单的儿子，亚撒的后裔之一 (尼 12:36)
